name: Island Pair-a-dice
description:
Welcome to Island Pair-a-dice How to play:

You have 3 turns to get as many points as you can!

On your turn, start by rolling the dice.

You'll earn points based on what you roll.

You can then choose to keep rolling for more points, or end your turn.

If you end your turn, you bank any points you earned that turn.

If you keep rolling, you can keep adding to your score...

But be careful! If you roll a 6 you lose all the points you've earned that turn. And if you happen to roll a double 6 you lose ALL of your points including the ones you've banked!

See if you can place on the leaderboard!
